name: IJ Dream Vacation Pvt. Ltd.

overview:
IJ Dream Vacation Pvt. Ltd. We are a “Complete Holiday Travel Solution Company” offering a choice and wide range of travel activities like Conferences, Meetings & Incentives, Business Travel, Leisure Holidays covering Heritage, Culture, Crafts and Textiles, Adventure, Shopping, Pilgrimage, Wellness & Medical, Spiritual/Yoga/Ayurveda, Wildlife tours for Individuals and Group travellers - all under one roof.

Our Management is backed by a stable financial background and comprises of an experienced team from the travel industry having more than 30 years of experience and a proven track record for providing quality and professional travel services in India. We are also backed up by a strong and well experienced Associate network throughout the country who are the best in their respective areas/cities to match & deliver the desired level of services and yardstick set by us.

Our Outbound Division offers “wing to wing” package services for group & individual tours by proposing domestic & international Itineraries, choice of hotels, Itinerary Planning, Travel logistic arrangements like ticketing/ accommodation/ meals/ Theme dinners/ Excursion tours/ visa/ travel insurance/ conference or convention arrangements, Management Training Program like team building activity for corporate or dealer incentive groups as per the clients’ need & budget. We propogate our entire activities under a very short term ” Relax & Rejoice” for our valued clients and patrons.
